title: GitHub Actions CI for Next.js Export
summary: Simple CI that validates content, builds, and exports the static site.
bodyMarkdown:
```yaml
name: build
on: [push]
jobs:
  export:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run validate:content
      - run: npm run build && npx next export
```
